property.name: description
property.value: Unlike the previous boards on the [[Sword Route]], Little Kris begins the game with [[Susie]]'s and [[Ralsei]]'s characters following them. Once they get the [[Sword (Sword Route)|sword]], however, they must be killed in order for Little Kris to become strong enough to continue into the [[Manhole Dungeon]].

property.name: description
property.value: Manhole leading into an underground dungeon.

property.name: description
property.value: A sword in an underground chamber. Allows Little Kris to kill their party members and enemies in the [[Manhole Dungeon]].
